name: One more Chance (Aquaramelia)
description:
Make Christmas come for the Snowflake!

Decorate the Christmas tree by collecting the decorations. 

Use the left and right arrow keys to move the Snowflake. 

After the Snowflake falls, it gets one more chance as a Bubble.

The game consists of ten levels, just enough to make the Snowflake's tree glow!

Music: "Sweetest Beauty" (2015)   by Aquaramelia

Made for the 95th Mini jam, themed "Chance", with the limitation of no RNG.
